definition: clock/o'clock/time as measured in hours and minutes/bell/CL:架[jia4],座[zuo4]
handleless cup/goblet/to concentrate/variant of 鐘|钟[zhong1]
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: He took the spring out of the clock but now he can't get it back.
sentences.chinese: 他将钟表里的发条取了出来，可现在装上不了。

sentences.english: This achievement led to the establishment of what was to become the renowned Connecticut clock-making industry.
sentences.chinese: 这项成就为康乃狄克州打造出名声卓越的钟表工业。

sentences.english: where the men who used to trade with the tea or the big clock merchants.
sentences.chinese: 那里男人曾经做茶叶的贸易或者大的钟表商。

sentences.english: Ticker is slang for one's heart because your heartbeats similar to the way in which a clock ticks.
sentences.chinese: 对，心脏是像钟表那样滴滴答答地跳动。

sentences.english: I know a watchmaker who will buy your watch.
sentences.chinese: 我认识一个钟表商，他会买您的表。

sentences.english: Clocks must be advanced one hour.
Of course, or a watch shop in the gift shop is also cheap music box sales.
sentences.chinese: 当然在钟表店或礼品店也有价格便宜的音乐盒销售。

sentences.english: Production of CNC Sample for home appliance, commodity, timekeeper and electronic product.
sentences.chinese: 家用电器，日用品，钟表电子产品手板制作。
在那时，她忽然注意到了钟表。

sentences.english: Clock visible on the wallbehind subject.
sentences.chinese: 目标后面的钟表清晰可见。

sentences.english: The time-code receiver IC is the core of the radio-controlled clock.
sentences.chinese: 时间编码接收芯片是电波钟表的核心。

sentences.english: Haiti will be facing storms like clockwork.
sentences.chinese: 海地将会遇到像钟表齿轮一样一连串的问题。

sentences.english: This type of mechanism is used in clocks to power the second hand movement.
sentences.chinese: 这用机械原理用于钟表中的秒针的驱动。

sentences.english: The clockmaker figured Moth's experiment with her possum was also likely to end soon.
sentences.chinese: 钟表匠想，莫丝对负鼠的实验有可能很快也结束了。

sentences.english: the clockmaker asked, testing how deeply the hook was set.
sentences.chinese: 钟表匠问，他在测试钩究竟深入到什么程度。

sentences.english: "So then I suppose you'll have to figure out how to care for it, " the clockmaker said.
sentences.chinese: “那么你得想办法照顾它了，”钟表匠说。

definition: variant of 表盤|表盘[biao3 pan2]/watch face
